2585.verse: لَا|Not|43|52|30$يَسْمَعُونَ|they will hear|109|128|731$حَسِيسَهَا‌ۖ|(the) slightest sound of it|191|210|11931$وَهُمْ|and they|79|98|256$فِى|in|48|67|89$مَا|what|53|72|262$ٱشْتَهَتْ|desire|88|98|11932$أَنفُسُهُمْ|their souls|88|308|3403$خَـٰلِدُونَ|will abide forever.|137|357|257$

2586.verse: لَا|Not|43|54|30$يَحْزُنُهُمُ|will grieve them|123|146|11933$ٱلْفَزَعُ|the terror|84|107|11934$ٱلْأَكْبَرُ|[the] greatest,|120|143|11935$وَتَتَلَقَّـٰهُمُ|and will meet them|145|168|11936$ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ|the Angels,|97|108|2202$هَـٰذَا|"This|59|91|248$يَوْمُكُمُ|(is) your Day|106|169|11937$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|128|138$كُنتُمْ|you were|81|144|214$تُوعَدُونَ|promised."|101|133|6059$

2588.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|99|640$كَتَبْنَا|We have written|130|148|4148$فِى|in|48|66|89$ٱلزَّبُورِ|the Scripture|107|125|11944$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|109|280$ٱلذِّكْرِ|the mention,|104|122|9969$أَنَّ|that|48|57|240$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth -|94|137|197$يَرِثُهَا|will inherit it|100|186|4696$عِبَادِىَ|My slaves,|90|176|11945$ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ|the righteous.|123|166|6962$

2590.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|96|46$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We have sent you|141|188|1101$إِلَّا|but|42|89|86$رَحْمَةً|(as) a mercy|105|152|2636$لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|for the worlds.|117|140|3107$

2592.verse: فَإِن|But if|55|62|227$تَوَلَّوْاْ|they turn away|122|135|1245$فَقُلْ|then say,|83|96|2705$ءَاذَنتُكُمْ|"I (have) announced to you|204|217|11947$عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍ‌ۖ|equally|123|136|11948$وَإِنْ|And not|72|79|213$أَدْرِىٓ|I know|74|92|11949$أَقَرِيبٌ|whether is near|123|159|11950$أَم|or|38|74|62$بَعِيدٌ|far|60|96|11951$مَّا|what|53|89|262$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised.|138|156|6059$

2595.verse: قَـٰلَ|He said,|73|88|309$رَبِّ|"My Lord!|82|112|7$ٱحْكُم|judge|68|98|5026$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۗ|in truth.|78|108|692$وَرَبُّنَا|And our Lord|104|134|11953$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ|(is) the Most Gracious,|172|187|1415$ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ|the One Whose help is sought|219|254|8874$عَلَىٰ|against|68|137|52$مَا|what|53|122|262$تَصِفُونَ|you attribute."|117|152|8875$

2585.verse: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.

2586.verse: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -

2587.verse: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.

2588.verse: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.

2589.verse: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.

2590.verse: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.

2591.verse: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"

2592.verse: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.

2593.verse: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.

2594.verse: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."

2595.verse: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
